name: Hunter's Path
desc: This gilded bow was made using precious white branches. It has felled countless wicked beasts attempting to infiltrate the woods.
skill_name: At the End of the Beast-Paths
skill_desc: Gain 12% All Elemental DMG Bonus. Obtain the Tireless Hunt effect after hitting an opponent with a Charged Attack. This effect increases Charged Attack DMG by 160% of Elemental Mastery. This effect will be removed after 12 Charged Attacks or 10s. Only 1 instance of Tireless Hunt can be gained every 12s.
